body:
<!-- Please use this template while reporting a bug and provide as much info as possible. Not doing so may result in your bug not being addressed in a timely manner. Thanks!-->


**What happened**:

Admission metrics name is `*_admission_latencies_seconds` and `*_admission_latencies_seconds_summary`, the units from metrics name are `seconds`, but actually the return metrics are in `microseconds`.

```
# HELP apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary Admission sub-step latency summary, broken out for each operation and API resource and step type (validate or admit).
# TYPE apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary summary
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="admit",quantile="0.5"} 21
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="admit",quantile="0.9"} 44
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="admit",quantile="0.99"} 70
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_sum{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="admit"} 5430
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_count{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="admit"} 208
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="validate",quantile="0.5"} 13
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="validate",quantile="0.9"} 54
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="validate",quantile="0.99"} 1483
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_sum{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="validate"} 10181
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_count{operation="CREATE",rejected="false",type="validate"} 187
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="admit",quantile="0.5"} 25
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="admit",quantile="0.9"} 30
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="admit",quantile="0.99"} 30
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_sum{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="admit"} 508
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_count{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="admit"} 19
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="validate",quantile="0.5"} 18
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="validate",quantile="0.9"} 20
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="validate",quantile="0.99"} 22
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_sum{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="validate"} 355
apiserver_admission_step_admission_latencies_seconds_summary_count{operation="UPDATE",rejected="false",type="validate"} 19
```

**What you expected to happen**:

Return metrics in true units.

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

curl apiserver:8080/metrics

**Anything else we need to know?**:

**Environment**:
- Kubernetes version (use `kubectl version`): master branch
- Cloud provider or hardware configuration:
- OS (e.g. from /etc/os-release):
- Kernel (e.g. `uname -a`):
- Install tools:
- Others:

<!-- DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE -->
/kind bug

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG API Machinery.
labels.name: sig/api-machinery

title: Admission metrics value not match their units
